_source.text: 0 Commander of the faithful, the Prophet said : The place of even an arrow in paradise for one of you is better than the world and its wealth, Your rule will not last for ever as it did not last for your predecessors.

text: you **is** **better** **than** the world and its wealth, Your rule will not last for ever as it did not last for your **predecessors**.
